alert.note: Alert for Halifax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 9:05PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Pittsylvania and northwestern Halifax Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 905 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Java to Keeling. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mt Airy... Ingram... Nathalie... Java... Cody... Leda... and Crystal Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
